channel.title: Golang on CyrusN
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on CyrusN

item.title: Golang Notes
item.description: Understanding Goroutine Is golang goroutine a coroutine? Coroutine vs Continuation vs Generator Comparison with generators MongoDB mgo Painless Data Storage with MongoDB and Go Connecting to MongoDB with mgo and golang Router mux - Gorilla, the golang web toolkit Middleware justinas/alice: Painless middleware chaining for Go SQL Database Go database/sql tutorial Authentication dgrijalva/jwt-go: Golang implementation of JSON Web Tokens (JWT) Golang Authentication Using JSON Web Tokens Useful Package PuerkitoBio/goquery: A little like that j-thing, only in Go.
